title: An electronic typewriter typeface
content:
Hey.  
I'm looking for informations about this typeface.  
It come from a french rural town museum.  
I suppose the text is composed with an 80's electronic typewriter.  
If anyone have an idea about this typeface, machine model ... and if it's still digitalized, please let it know.  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211034321im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typewriter2_4986.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211034321im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typewriter1_5871.png)
author: s.degeilh
